GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specific article by id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for specified article in descending order of date

exampleResponse.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

exampleResponse.body: This morning, I showered for nine minutes.
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the newly posted comment object for the given article_id
